byline.contributor: Nida Najar contributed reporting from New Delhi.

abstract: Robert Penner, Canadian man living in Nepal, is arrested after posting politically controversial Twitter message about country; Penner has addressed political issues on social media often in past.

headline.main: Nepal Arrests Canadian Man Over ‘Provocative’ Twitter Post

snippet: The man, Robert Penner, is accused of “unnecessary comments” about Nepal’s internal affairs.
lead_paragraph: The man, Robert Penner, is accused of “unnecessary comments” about Nepal’s internal affairs.
